Tier 0 - Direct Control of enterprise identities in the environment. Tier 0 includes accounts, groups, and other assets that have direct or indirect administrative control of the Active Directory forest, domains, or domain controllers, and all the assets in it. The security sensitivity of all Tier 0 assets is equivalent as they are all effectively in control of each other

NSG: Tier 0 - Direct Control of enterprise identities in the environment. The security sensitivity of all Tier 0 assets is equivalent as they are all effectively in control of each other

Arbitrary name for the new connection between an Azure VNet and another network
The type of VPN connection Route or Policy based.
Arbitrary name for the new connection between an Azure VNet and another network
Gateway SKU, the type of gateway Basic, Standard, High Performance
The type of gateway that is being created.  This can be either StaticRouting or DynamicRouting.
The name of the ER Circuit
Chosen SKU Tier of ExpressRoute circuit. Choose from Premium or Standard SKU tiers.
Chosen SKU family of ExpressRoute circuit. Choose from MeteredData or UnlimitedData SKU families.
This is the bandwidth in Mbps of the circuit being created. It must exactly match one of the available bandwidth offers List ExpressRoute Service Providers API call.
ExpressRoute Service Provider Name
The ExpressRoute Peering Location.
The Subscrition ID
Will the gateway use BGP routing?
Arbitrary name for the new connection between an Azure VNet and another network
Azure VNET of the current location
Name for the destination connection between an Azure VNet and another network
Arbitrary name for the new connection between an Azure VNet and another network
An array of Local IP address prefixes that this gateway will route traffic to.
The type of connection. For connecting to ExpressRoute circuits, the connectionType must be of type ExpressRoute. Other types are IPsec and Vnet2Vnet.
The shared key to negotiate the VPN connection.  KeyVault will hold this secret.
The routing weight tells the protocol how expensive it is to route on this gateway.
